name: Beam 2:D
description:
It's the sequel nobody asked for: Beam 2: D! A successor to the game Beam which I worked on last fall. 

Controlls: 
A/D: Move left/right
W: Jump
Left Mouse: use grab beam
Right Mouse: use swap beam

grab beam will move the cube, swap beam will swap the positions of you and the cube

Created for the 2022 0 hour gam jam with the theme "remake something that shouldn't be remade"
